function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in occupant density leads to a higher risk of virus transmission in buildings","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission and increased infection rates among building occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce occupant density, such as staggered schedules or remote work options","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Occupant behavior has a significant impact on energy consumption in buildings","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and environmental impact due to inefficient occupant behaviors","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy conservation education programs and smart building technologies","Technologies":"Machine learning for energy consumption prediction, smart building automation systems","People":"Building occupants, energy management teams","Owner":"Building owners, energy management teams"},{"Description":"Architectural design parameters, indoor moisture content, temperature, and lighting level can impact microbial survivability in buildings","Impact":"Higher microbial survivability in buildings leading to potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing building design and maintenance measures to regulate indoor conditions and reduce microbial survivability","Technologies":"Building management systems, indoor environmental quality monitoring systems","People":"Building designers, maintenance teams, public health authorities","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance teams"}]}
